title: The Daily: Mt. Gox pushes back repayment deadline, Standard Chartered says bitcoin may never fall below $100k again, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Ethereum Network MegaETH Attracts $350M in Token Sale, Valuing MEGA at $7 Billion
contentSnippet: MegaETH's massively oversubscribed initial coin offering has resulted in a "hypothetical" FDV of $7 billion, the team said.

title: Trump Sons' American Bitcoin Stock Jumps After Adding $163 Million to BTC Treasury
contentSnippet: The company holds approximately 3,865 Bitcoin acquired through mining and strategic purchases.

title: Apollo partners with Coinbase to ‘unlock’ stablecoin lending business
contentSnippet: Coinbase already allows some U.S.-based customers to borrow up to $100,000, using the their digital assets as collateral.

title: Crypto Funds Pull in $921M on Fed Rate Cut Optimism
contentSnippet: Investor confidence returned to digital assets as softer U.S. inflation data fueled expectations of further monetary easing.

title: Coinbase and Citi to explore digital payments, including stablecoin payouts, for bank’s institutional clients
contentSnippet: Initial focus includes Coinbase working with Citi on digital asset payment options for the bank's institutional clients.

title: Senators Warren, Schiff Push Resolution Denouncing Trump Pardon of Binance Founder
contentSnippet: The senators took issue both with the Binance founder’s failure to implement anti-money laundering measures at the crypto exchange, and Binance’s ties to the Trump family.

title: Citi Taps Coinbase to Enhance Crypto Payments for Institutions
contentSnippet: Citi partners with Coinbase to boost crypto payment options for institutional clients, bridging traditional finance and digital assets.

title: ICP Faces Downward Pressure but Traders Eye Relief Bounce Near $3.15
contentSnippet: Internet Computer slid to $3.19 after breaking support, but buyers see short-term rebound potential near $3.15.

title: Website for MetaMask claims portal surfaces, spiking odds of MASK token launch on Polymarket
contentSnippet: MetaMask Director of Product Christian Montoya previously told The Block that the hot-wallet platform is “launching a new loyalty program.”

title: BONK Battles Back After Breaking Support; Traders Eye $0.000015 Rebound
contentSnippet: BONK slipped below the key $0.000015 support but traders anticipate a near-term bounce as volume surges.

title: South Korean Crypto Exchanges See 1,400x Jump in Flows Linked to Sanctioned Cambodian Entities
contentSnippet: Bithumb led with 12.4 billion won, followed by Upbit with 366 million won. Smaller amounts moved through Coinone and Korbit, while Gopax reported no activity.

title: Trump brothers’ American Bitcoin snaps up $160 million in BTC, vaulting into top-25 public treasuries
contentSnippet: Shares of ABTC rose nearly 12% on Monday to $6.28, though the stock remains below its Nasdaq debut price of $8.04 in early September.

title: Tom Lee’s BitMine Rises as Ethereum Rebounds, Firm Adds $321 Million in ETH
contentSnippet: BitMine Immersion Technologies now holds over $13.8 billion worth of Ethereum, widening its ETH treasury lead over SharpLink Gaming.

title: Trump's American Bitcoin and Saylor's Strategy Add to Bitcoin Holdings
contentSnippet: American Bitcoin acquired 1,414 BTC while Michael Saylor’s Strategy added 390 BTC.

title: IBM Debuts 'Digital Asset Haven' Platform for Governments and Institutions
contentSnippet: Publicly traded computing firm IBM is rolling out a digital assets management platform targeted at governments and institutions.

title: Standard Chartered says bitcoin may never fall below $100,000 again ‘if this week goes well’
contentSnippet: Standard Chartered’s Geoffrey Kendrick says easing U.S.-China tensions have lifted sentiment from fear to hope, among other factors.

title: Strategy Shares Rise on $43 Million Purchase—Its Largest in Four Weeks
contentSnippet: Strategy hasn’t issued common shares in nearly a month.

title: Why Traders Should Watch the Bitcoin to Gold Ratio
contentSnippet: Bitcoin climbs back near $115K as trade war fears ease, but ETF flows still lag gold—can crypto catch up before Trump meets Xi?

title: Crypto Stocks Climb Alongside Bitcoin and Nasdaq on Chinese Trade Talk Optimism
contentSnippet: Robinhood was leading among the exchanges and Trump-affiliated American Bitcoin was higher by 10% after adding to its bitcoin stack.

title: PEPE Drops Nearly 2% as Memecoins Struggle, Late-Session Bounce Hints at Buyer Support
contentSnippet: Despite the drop, trading volume was only 7.55% above the weekly average, suggesting routine profit-taking rather than a significant shift in sentiment.

title: Fed Vice Chair Michelle Bowman among other pro-crypto candidates to lead the Federal Reserve
contentSnippet: Crypto-supportive Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman is one of five candidates to lead the central bank.

title: Bitcoin Lender Ledn Hits $1B in Loan Origination This Year as BTC Credit Market Picks Up
contentSnippet: The crypto lender also crossed $100 million in annual recurring revenue, the firm reported.

title: How October Was the Most Destructive Month in Recent Memory for at Least Some Crypto Traders
contentSnippet: What began as a triumphant October for bitcoin quickly devolved into chaos as a $19 billion derivatives wipeout and a 17% price plunge left traders reeling.

title: Ledn posts record Q3 lending volume as its bitcoin-backed loan originations surpass $1 billion for 2025
contentSnippet: Ledn registered a record $392 million in lending volume for Q3 — almost matching its entire total for last year.

title: MegaETH raises $50 million in minutes as MEGA token sale tops 3x demand
contentSnippet: MegaETH’s public auction drew accredited investors from around the world, with buyers able to lock tokens for a 10% discount.

title: Tom Lee's BitMine Immersion Added Another $320M in Ether, Bringing Overall Holdings Above $14B
contentSnippet: The crypto investment firm now holds over 3.31 million ETH, moving closer to its goal of owning 5% of the token’s supply.

title: IBM Unveils Digital Asset Platform as Demand for Tokenization, Stablecoins Grows
contentSnippet: The IBM Digital Asset Haven, developed with Dfns, aims to offer banks, governments and enterprises a full-stack platform for token custody, governance and compliance.

title: Morning Minute: Crypto Rips On US China Trade Deal Hopes
contentSnippet: $150 billion was added to the market cap of all cryptocurrencies over the weekend—and it looks like the rally isn't slowing down.

title: BitMine’s Ethereum holdings surpass 3.3 million ether after latest 77,055 ETH purchase
contentSnippet: BitMine's total crypto and cash holdings have reached $14.2 billion, and the company owns more than 2.7% of Ethereum's circulating supply.
